title: Ricochet
description:
Jessica Thompson, Shelby Wilson, and Ernest Anfin share stories about suspicious packages, a strange honeymoon, and intense times on a farm.
Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Jessica Thompson, Stars of the Lid, Johnny Cash, Shelby Wilson, John LaSala, Greyflood, Kevin Allison, Ernest Anfin, Cocteau Twins, Jennifer Paige)
